headline.main: Chinese Buyers Expect Closure of AC Milan Deal by December 13
headline.print_headline: Chinese Buyers Expect Closure of AC Milan Deal by December 13

docs.snippet: The Chinese consortium seeking to buy Italian soccer club AC Milan expects to conclude the deal by Dec. 13, it said in a statement on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Chinese consortium seeking to buy Italian soccer club AC Milan expects to conclude the deal by Dec. 13, it said in a statement on Thursday.

headline.main: Trump Considering Mitt Romney for Secretary of State: NBC News
headline.print_headline: Trump Considering Mitt Romney for Secretary of State: NBC News

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump is considering Mitt Romney, the 2012 Republican presidential nominee, for secretary of state, NBC News reported on Thursday, citing unnamed sources.

headline.main: Canada, Mexico Leaders to Discuss NAFTA Strategy This Weekend-Source
headline.print_headline: Canada, Mexico Leaders to Discuss NAFTA Strategy This Weekend-Source

docs.snippet: The leaders of Mexico and Canada will hold talks this weekend on  the potential impact that a Donald Trump presidency could have on the NAFTA trade pact, a source close to the matter said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The leaders of Mexico and Canada will hold talks this weekend on  the potential impact that a Donald Trump presidency could have on the NAFTA trade pact, a source close to the matter said on Thursday.

headline.main: Judge: Walker Had Authority to Cut Alaska Dividend Amount
headline.print_headline: Judge: Walker Had Authority to Cut Alaska Dividend Amount

docs.snippet: A state court judge ruled Thursday that Gov. Bill Walker had the authority to reduce this year's Alaska Permanent Fund dividend, siding with the state in the politically charged case....
docs.lead_paragraph: A state court judge ruled Thursday that Gov. Bill Walker had the authority to reduce this year's Alaska Permanent Fund dividend, siding with the state in the politically charged case.

headline.main: Jamie Murray, Bruno Soares Still on Course to End Year as Number Ones
headline.print_headline: Jamie Murray, Bruno Soares Still on Course to End Year as Number Ones

docs.snippet: Jamie Murray and Bruno Soares stayed on track to end 2016 as the world number ones after reaching the ATP World Tour doubles semi-finals by beating Croat Ivan Dodig and Brazilian Marcelo Melo 6-3 3-6 10-6 on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jamie Murray and Bruno Soares stayed on track to end 2016 as the world number ones after reaching the ATP World Tour doubles semi-finals by beating Croat Ivan Dodig and Brazilian Marcelo Melo 6-3 3-6 10-6 on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Wave of Ethnic Killings Engulfs Town in South Sudan

headline.main: Report: 3 Killed, 13 Trapped in Mine Collapse in Turkey
headline.print_headline: Report: 3 Killed, 13 Trapped in Mine Collapse in Turkey

docs.lead_paragraph: A copper mine has collapsed in southeast Turkey on Thursday, killing three workers and trapping 13 others inside, media reports said.

headline.main: Mozambique Death Toll Rises to 73 After Fuel Truck Explodes: Government
headline.print_headline: Mozambique Death Toll Rises to 73 After Fuel Truck Explodes: Government

docs.snippet: The death toll from a fuel truck explosion in Mozambique on Thursday rose to 73 people, and scores of other people were injured, the government said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The death toll from a fuel truck explosion in Mozambique on Thursday rose to 73 people, and scores of other people were injured, the government said.
